trends: There have been 3 other sightings in BOSTON
There were no other sightings in BOSTON on or around August 3rd 2012
Summary: Slow moving fire ball that stopped for about one minute then proceeded north then darken totally
divs: Sighting DetailsMY WIFE AND I WERE SITTING ON OUR SOUTH FACING DECK AT 9:00 pm EATING PIZZA WHEN MY WIFE SAID, LOOK AT THIS OBJECT IN THE SKY ABOVE US, SO I GOT UP TO OBSERVE THIS OBJECT. IT WAS MOVING SLOWLY, IT APPEARED TO BE LIKE A FIRE BALL WITH A SLIGHT TAIL HEADING SSE TO NNW WHEN IT STOPPED FOR AT LEAST 1-2 MINUTES THAN CHANGE DIRECTION NORTH, AT THAT TIME IT STARTED GETTING REAL DIM AND IT SEEMED TO HAVE A DARK CLOUD BEHIND IT, THEN IT DISAPPEARD. WE BOTH NEW THAT THE OBJECT WASN'T A AIRCRAFT AND IT WAS MOVING TO SLOW FOR A MITEORITE.
